definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. As

definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: upon, and hence on the ground of, according to, on account of, on behalf of, concerning, beside, in addition to, together with, beyond, above, over, by, on to, towards, to, against (SI:4.6; Moab. Aram. id.; Ph. [[על]], and [[עלת]]; Palm. Nab. [[על]]; Sab. [[עלי]], Ar. 9alay);—abbrev. from [[עֲלֵי]] (cf. [[אֱלֵי]], [[עֲדֵי]]), which is preserved in poetry, Ge 49:17, Ge 49:17, Ge 49:22, Ge 49:22, Nu 24:6, Nu 24:6, De 32:2, De 32:2, Is 18:4, Je 8:18, Mic 5:6, La 4:5, 1Ki 20:41 Qr, Job 7:1 Qr + 10 t. Psalm, 3 t. Pr, 15 t. Jb; with sf. [[עָלַי]]; [[עָלֶיְ]], [[עָלַיִךְ]] († Ps 116:7 the Aramaizing form [[עָלָָיְכִי]]); [[עָלָיו]], Psalm 1Sa 2:10 [[עָלָו]], [[עָלֶיהָ]]; 1 pl. [[עָלֵינוּ]]; 2 mpl. [[עֲלֵיכֶם]], † Ex 12:13 [[עֲלֵכֶם]], 2 fpl. [[עֲלֵיכֶן]] † Ez Eze 23:49; 3 mpl. [[עֲלֵיהֶם]], 13 t. in Pent. [[עֲלֵהֶם]] Ge 45:15, etc. (Kö:ii. 305), poet. [[עָלֵ֫ימוֹ]] De 22:23 + 11 t. Psalm, Jb (perh. sts., Ges:§ 103 i, N.); 3 fpl. [[עֲלֵיהֶן]], † Le 3:4, Le 3:10, Le 3:15 [[עֲלֵהֶן]] (on the appar. plur. form of [[עֲלֵי]], [[עָלַי]] etc., v. Kö:ii. 309 ff., and cf. sub [[עַד]]).

Upon, of the substratum upon which an object in any way rests, or on which an action is performed; as [[על־הארץ]] upon the earth Ge 1:11, Ge 1:26, Ge 7:6, etc., Ps 110:6 [[על ארץ רבה]] over a wide country; [[על האדמה]] upon the ground Ez Eze 20:12 + oft., Am 7:12 [[עַל אֲדָמָה טְמֵאָה]], Is 14:2 ´[[על אדמת י]], Ps 137:4 [[עַל אַדְמַת נֵכָר]] ([[אֲרָמָה]] being properly ground, soil, is construed regularly with [[על]], [[באדמה]] being very rare), more definitely [[על פני]] [[האדמה]] Ge 6:1, Nu 12:3 + oft.; [[על מקום]] Le 14:28, Je 45:5 (uncommon: usu. [[בְּ]]); De 17:20, Is 9:6 [[על]] [[מַמְלַכְתּוֹ]] upon his realm, 2Ch 1:1; [[על בָּֽתִּים]] very strangely Ho 11:11 (rd. [[וַהֲשִׁבׂתִים]] with LXX : v. 7 c a b); constantly after such vbs. as [[נוח]], [[ישׁב]], [[רכב]], etc., Ge 8:4, Ex 11:5; [[כתב על]] to write (idiom.) on a book or other surface, Jos 10:13, etc.; [[יחא על]] go forth over Ge 41:45, Zec 5:3, Ps 81:6; with [[נִשְׁעַן]], [[נִסְמַח]], [[בָּטַח]] (fig.), to lean or trust upon: Ge 3:14 to go [[עַל גְּחׂנְְ]] upon thy belly, Ge 32:32 to limp [[עַל יְרֵכוֹ]] upon his thigh, 1Sa 14:13, Ez Eze 37:10; Ju Jdg 15:8 to smite [[שׁוֹק עַל יׇרֵח]] leg upon thigh, i.e. so that the scattered limbs fall one upon another, Am 3:15. And with ref. not a horizontal surface but to a side, Le 1:5 + [[זׇרַק עַל]] to pour against the altar, 1Ki 6:5, 1Ki 6:18 to build against the temple, Jos 10:27, etc. Fig. Ex 23:13 let it not be heard [[עַל פִּיְ]] upon thy mouth (in our idiom, upon thy lips, as Pr 22:18), Ps 15:3 [[לאׁ רָגַל עַל לְשׁׂנוֹ]] he slandereth not (i.e. prepares not slander) upon his tongue, 2Sa 23:2 [[וּמִלָּתוֹ עַל]] [[לְשׁוֹנִי]], Pr 16:23, Pr 16:27, Pr 31:26, Ec 5:1; cf. [[עַל שְׂפָתַיִם]] [[נׇשָׂא]] or [[עַל פֶּה]] Ps 16:4, Ps 50:16; Ez Eze 36:3.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: Specially

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: —(a) of clothing, etc., which any one wears, Ge 37:23 the tunic [[אשׁר עליו]] which was upon him, Jos 9:5, 1Ki 11:30, Ru 3:15 +; Ge 24:30, Ge 38:30, 2Sa 13:18, of a sword 2Sa 20:8, Ct So 3:8; so [[הָיׇה עַל]] Le 16:4, De 22:5, Ez Eze 44:18, 1Ch 15:27, 1Ch 18:7 (‖ 2Sa 8:7 [[אֶל]] : see p. 41 a); cf. [[לאׁ יַעֲלֶה עָלֶיְ]] Le 19:19, Ez Eze 44:17, and with [[הֶעֱלָה]], below,

definitions.title: 7 b.
Def
definitions.body: (b) With verbs of covering or protecting, even though the cover or veil be not over or above the thing covered, but around or before it (‘ upon ’ referred to a side) : v. [[גׇּנַן]], [[כָּסָה]], [[סָכַח]], [[עָטָה]] Ne 2:8 [[יד אלהי הטובה עלי]], cf. v:Ne 2:18, Ezr 7:6, Ezr 7:9, Ezr 8:18, Ezr 8:22, Ezr 8:31; Ex 27:21 the veil that is over (i.e. before) the testimony, 1Sa 25:16 [[חוֹמָה הָיוּ עָלֵינוּ]] they were a wall about us ; [[סָגַר עַל]] to shut in (or down) upon Ex 14:13, Job 12:14; Ez Eze 13:5, Job 13:27, Job 26:9, Job 36:30 he spreadeth his light [[עָלָיו]] about him.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Of what rests heavily upon a person, or is a burden to him, Is 1:14 [[הָיוּ עָלַי לָטׂרַח]] they are a cumbrance upon me, Job 7:20 I am a burden [[עָלַי]] upon myself, 2Sa 15:33 (cf. with [[אֶל]] 2Sa 19:36) ; [[כָּבַד עֶל]] to be heavy upon Ex 5:9 al. (v. [[כָּבַד]]); of sin, calamity, etc. Is 53:5, Ez Eze 33:10, Ps 88:8, Job 21:9, 2Ch 15:5, 2Ch 28:13, Ec 6:1, Ec 8:6 (cf.

definitions.title: 5 a
definitions.body: b); Le 7:20 [[וְטֻמְאָתוֹ]] [[עָלָיו]] Le 22:3: idiomatically, Ge 48:7 [[מֵתָה עָלַי רָחֵל]] Rachel died upon me (i.e. to my sorrow), Ge 33:13 [[וְהַבָּקָר עָלוֹת עָלַי]] are giving suck upon me (i.e. as a. care to me), Nu 11:13 [[יִבְכּוּ עָלַי]] they weep upon me (vexing me), Ju Jdg 14:16, Jdg 14:17, Jdg 19:2 (v. Be), 1Sa 21:6 to play the mad man upon me, Je 12:11.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: Of a duty, payment, care, etc., imposed upon a person, or devolving on him, as [[שָׂם עַל]] to lay upon, Ex 5:8, Ex 21:22, Ex 21:30 ([[שָׁת]]), Ex 22:4, cf. Ge 47:26, 2Ch 35:25; with other verbs, Job 38:10, De 24:5, De 26:6, 2Ki 15:20, 2Ki 18:14, 2Ki 23:33, Ne 10:33, Ne 10:33, Es 1:8, Es 9:21, Es 9:27, Es 9:31; with [[חִוׇּה]] enjoin upon Ge 2:16 + oft., [[כתב]] prescribe to 2Ki 22:13, Ps 40:8, [[נטשׁ]] cast upon 1Sa 17:20 (v:1Sa 17:22 [[על יד]]), [[נתן על יד]] (fig.) Ge 42:37, 2Ki 12:12, 2Ki 22:5, cf. 1 K 1Ki 14:27, [[עזב]] Ps 10:14, [[גלל]] Ps 37:5, [[השׁליך]] Ps 55:23, [[פקד]] Job 34:13 al.; Ge 30:28 [[נׇקְבָה שְׂכָֽרְ ְעָלַי]] fix thy wages upon me (name thy wages to me), Ge 34:12 [[הַרְבּוּ עָלַי מְאׂד מׂהַר]] [[וּמַתָּו]] multiply upon me, etc., 2Sa 19:39 (pregn.) whatsoever thou choosest (and layest) upon me; without a verb, Ju Jdg 19:20 [[רַק כָּל־מַחְסׂער ְעָלָָי]] only let all thy wants be upon me, Ezr 10:4, Ps 56:13 [[עָלַי נְדָרֶיְ]] thy vows are upon me (i.e. I owe them: cf. Nu 30:7, Nu 30:9, Nu 30:15), Pr 7:14 [[זִבְחֵי שְׁלָמִים עָלָָי]] peace-offerings were upon me (= were due from me); perh. Ps 62:1, Ps 77:1 (to the charge of); with an inf. 2Sa 18:11 [[וְעָלַי לָתֵת]] and it would have been incumbent on  me to give, etc., 1Ki 4:7, Ezr 10:12 (accents [Baer], RV:m), Ne 13:3, cf. Zec 12:2 (Ew RV:m); Nu 7:9 (P) the service of ... was upon them, Ez Eze 45:17, so especially late 1Ch 9:27, 1Ch 9:33, 1Ch 23:31, 2Ch 2:3 [[לעולם זאת על ישׂראל]] 2Ch 8:15, 2Ch 24:9, Ezr 7:11, Ne 11:23; Is 9:5 and the government is upon, his shoulder (cf. Is 22:22), 2Ch 25:3; Ps 7:11 ´[[מָֽגִנִּי עַל־א]] my shield rests upon God (he has undertaken my defence), Ps 62:8 [[על־אלהים יִשְׁעִי וּכְבׂדִי]].

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[על]] is used idiom. to give pathos to the expression of an emotion, by emphasizing the person who is its subject, and who, as it were, feels it acting upon him: Ps 42:6 why art thou cast down, O my soul, [[וַתֶּהֱמִי עָלַי]] and disquieted upon me? v:Ps 42:7 my soul upon me is cast down, v:Ps 42:11, Ps 43:5, La 3:20; Ps 131:2 [[כְּגׇמֻל עֲלֵי]] [[אִמּוֹ כַּגׇּמוּל עָלַי נַפְשִׁי]] is my soul upon me; Ps 142:4 [[בְּהִתְעַטֵף עָלַי רוּחִי]] when my spirit faints upon me, Ps 143:4, Jon 2:8; Je 8:18 :[[עָלַי לִבִּי דַרוָּֽי ]] my heart upon me is sick, Job 14:22, Job 14:22 (cf. Di), Ho 11:8 [[נהפך עלי לבי]] my heart is turned (altered) upon me, 1Sa 17:32, 1Sa 25:36, Ne 5:7 [[וַיִמָּלֵךְ לִבִּי עָלַי]] and my heart took counsel upon me: cf. Ps 42:5 I will pour out my soul upon me, Job 30:16; Job 10:1 [[אעזבה]] [[עלי שׂיחי]] I will let loose my complaint upon me. (Thes apud me, mecum. The rend. ‘within me’ alters entirely the point of view of the Heb. expression, and is incorrect.) Denoting with some emph. the subj. of an experience, Job 30:2 [[עלימו אבד כָָּלַךְ]], Da 2:1 his sleep [[נִהְיְתָה עָלָיו]] was done with upon him (cf. Aram. Da 6:19 [[נַדַּת עֲלוֹהִי]]), Da 10:8 [[וְהוֹדִי נֶהְפַּךְ עָלַי]] (cf. Da 5:9, Da 7:28): also, rather differently, Le 18:18 b, Je 49:20 [[אִם לאׁ יַשִׁים עֲלֵיהֶם נְוֵהֶם]], Mic 7:13, Ps 90:17 b; Ps 7:9 acc. to my perfectness upon me, Ez Eze 18:20; Eze 22:3, 2Ch 36:8.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: [[חָיׇה עַל]] to live upon (as upon a foundation or support; cf. Is 3:1, and Zh=n e)pi/ tinov), De 8:3 [[עַל־הַלֶּחֶם]], Is 38:16 (cf. Hi), Ge 27:40 [[על חרבך תחיה]] upon ( = by) thy sword thou shalt live (cf. Kazwini:ii. 17 ap. Tuch), Ez Eze 33:19, cf. v:Eze 33:26.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: Of the ground, or basis, on which a thing is done, as Ge 24:9 [[על הדבר הזה]], Le 17:12 if he offers it [[עַל תּוֹדָה]] on the ground of a thanks-giving, Nu 6:21 [[עַל נִזְרוֹ]], v:b Ez Eze 16:15, Eze 28:17, Da 8:25 [[עַל שִׂכְלוֹ]], Da 9:18 [[עַל חדקותינו]], (with 9alay this use is extended so as to denote explicitly on condition of). Hence (a) the basis being conceived as regulative, [[על]] comes to denote the norm or standard (cf. Germ. ‘auf die Art’ W:AG ii. § 59 i): the transition may be seen in a passage like Ex 24:8 the covenant which ´[[י]] made with you on the basis of ([[על]]), or in agreement with,  all these words (cf. [[על פי]] Ex 34:27), Nu 35:24 [[האלה על המשׁפטים]], De 17:11, Je 30:18 the palace shall sit (i.e. be inhabited: v. [[ישׁב]]) [[עַל מִשְׁפָּטוֹ]] in accordance with its manner, Ps 94:20 who frames mischief [[עֲלֵי־חׂק]] in accordance with a law, ... [[על פי]] acc. to the mouth (i.e. command, Ge 45:21 + oft, evidence De 17:6, De 19:15, sentence De 21:5) of…; …[[עַל שֵׁם ]] acc. to the name of…(mostly with call, be called) Ge 48:6, Ex 28:21, 2Sa 18:18 +, cf. 1Ch 23:14; Ex 6:26, Ex 12:51 [[עַל חִבְאׂתָם]] acc. to their hosts (usu. [[לְ]]), Nu 1:18 [[על משׁפחתם]] (usu. [[לְ]]) v:Nu 1:52, Nu 2:2, Nu 2:34, Nu 7:3 (‖[[ל]]), De 18:8 (prob.); [[עַל יְדֵי]] acc. to the hands (direction) of Je 5:31, Je 33:13 al. (v. p. 391 b); Ps 110:4 ´[[עַל דִּבְרָתִי מ]] after the manner of M.; Pr 25:11 (prob.) a word spoken [[עַל אָעפנׇיו]] in accordance with its circumstances = appositely; of the tune acc. to which a song is to be sung (RV. set to) Ps 6:1 (1Ch 15:21), Ps 8:1, Ps 9:1, Ps 12:1, Ps 45:1, Ps 46:1 (1Ch 15:20) [[עַל־עֲלָמוֹת]] (perh., however, in the manner ofmaidens = for ‘sopranos’), Ps 53:1, Ps 56:1, Ps 60:1, Ps 69:1, Ps 81:1, Ps 84:1, Ps 88:1 (cf. in Syr. d wlo0 9al).

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: (b) The basis being conceived as involving the ground, [[על]] denotes the cause or reason, on account of, because of, Ge 20:3 lo thou shalt die [[עַל הָאִשָּׁה]] on account of the woman, Ge 21:12, Ge 26:7, Ge 26:9, Ge 27:41, Ge 42:21, Le 4:3, Le 4:28, Le 5:18, Le 19:17, Le 26:18, Le 26:24, Le 26:28, De 9:18, De 24:16 fathers shall not be put to death [[על־בנים]] on account of  children, De 31:18, Jos 9:20, Je 1:16, Je 5:9, Ez Eze 18:26 [[עליהם]](‖ Eze 33:18 [[בָּהֶם]]), Pr 28:21, Ps 39:12, Ps 50:8 + oft.; Ps 44:23 [[עָלֶי ְהׂרַגְנוּ]] on thy account are we slain all the day, Ps 69:8, Je 15:15; in the phrases [[עַל]]…[[דְּבַר ]], [[עַל אוֹדוֹת]], [[עַל זאׁת]] and [[עַל זֶה]] on this account, [[עַל מָה]] on what account ? [[עַל־כֵּן]] = therefore (v. [[דָּבָר]], [[אוֹדָה]], etc.); before an inf., as Ex 17:7 ´[[וְעַל נַסּוֹתָם אֶת־י]] and on, account of their trying ´[[י]], Am 1:3 [[עַל דּוּשָׁם]] on account of their threshing = because they threshed, v:Am 1:6, v:Am 1:9, v:Am 1:11, v:Am 1:13, etc., Je 2:35 [[עַל אָמְרֵךְ]] because of thy saying, Je 9:12, Je 16:18 +; and as a conj. both with and without [[אֲשֶׁר]] or [[כִּי]] (v. infr.

definitions.title: III
definitions.body: ). And so often of the ground or cause of fear, grief, delight, or other emotions, e.g. Ex 18:9, Ex 32:14 ([[נִחַם]] repent: so oft.), 1Sa 4:13, 1Sa 30:6, 2Sa 1:26, 2Sa 3:8, 1Ki 21:4, 2Ki 6:11, Je 10:19, Am 6:6.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: (c) Somewhat more strongly, on behalf of, for the sake of, Ge 19:17 escape [[על נפשׁך]] forthy life; Ju Jdg 9:17, 2Ki 10:3 [[נִלְחֵם עַל]] (usu. [[ל]]); 1Ki 2:18 I will speak on thy behalf to the king, v:1Ki 2:19 (2Ki 4:13 [[לְ]]); Es 4:16, Es 4:8, Es 7:7, Es 8:11, Es 9:16, Da 12:1 [[על עמר]] stand up (in late Heb.) on behalf of; [[התפלל על]] intercede for (usu. [[בעד]]) Job 42:8, Ne 1:6, 2Ch 30:18, 2Ch 29:21, Ezr 8:35; and very often with [[כִּפֶּר]] (q.v.) make atonement for. (Not very common with other verbs.)

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: (d) Sometimes it acquires almost a final force, for; Ex 12:4, Ex 29:36, Ex 30:16, De 27:13 there shall stand [[עַל־הַקְּלָלָה]] (‖ v:De 27:12 [[לְבָרֵח]]), Ps 89:4 [[עַל־מַה־שָּׁוְא]] [[בָּרָאתָ כָל־עבּנֵי־אָדָם]] unto what vanity hast thou created, etc.! Pr 29:5 b, 2Ch 23:18, Ec 3:17.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: (e) Of a condition, or attendant circumstances (rare; so 9alay, W:AG ii § 59 e): Ps 50:5 [[עֲלֵי]] :[[זׇ֑בַח]] upon, with sacrifice, Ps 92:4 ´[[עֲלי עָשׂוֹר וגו]] with a ten-stringed instr., with a harp, with sounding music on a lyre ; [[עַל רִיב]] upon occasion of a law-suit Ex 23:2, Ex 44:24, [[עַל יוֹם טוֹב]] 1Sa 25:8 (cf. h.iyn 9alay at a time of… Qor 28:14), Ne 12:22 (? rd. [[עַד]] BeRy), Is 18:4 [[כְּחׂם חַח עֲלֵי אוֹר]] at time of sunshine, Is 64:11 [[עַל אֵלֶּה]], Je 8:18; [[עֲלֵי יׇגוֹן]] at time of sorrow, Je 16:7 (but Gie [[עַל אָבֵל]] to): with abstr. substs. to form a periphr. for adverbs, Le 5:22 and swear [[עַל שֶׁקֶר]] upon falseness = falsely, Je 6:14 = Je 8:11 to heal a wound [[עַל נְקַלָּה]] lightly, easily, Ps 31:24 [[עַל יֶתֶר]] = abundantly, Is 60:7 [[עַל רָחוֹן]] = acceptably (cf. lad=ah;in 9ala = with delight).

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: (f ) It hence acquires the force of in spite of, notwithstanding (so 9ala, W:AG ii. § 59 h), Job 10:7 [[עַל דַּעְתְְּ]] in spite of thy knowing, Job 34:6 [[משׁפטי על]] notwithstanding my right I am to be a liar (Di De Da RV: otherwise Hi RV:m). Cf. below,

definitions.title: III c
definitions.body: b.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: (g) Upon, concerning, with vbs. of speaking, as [[דִּבֶּר]] Ju Jdg 9:3, 1Ki 5:13, [[אָמַר]], Je 16:3, Je 27:19 (‖[[אל]]) Je 33:4, hearing Ge 41:15 [[שָׁמַעְתִּי עָלֶיְ]] I have heard concerning thee, saying, etc., 1Ki 10:6, Is 37:9 (‖ 2Ki 19:9 [[אל]]), disputing Ge 26:11, telling 1Sa 27:11, Joe 1:3, commanding 2Sa 14:8, 1Ki 11:10, being vexed 1Ki 21:4, 2Ki 6:11, crying 2Ki 8:5, confessing Ps 32:5, Ne 1:6; of the object of a prophecy or vision 1Ki 22:8, Is 1:1, Is 2:1; and often with similar verbs.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: (h) In a somewhat weaker sense, in the matter of, as regards, Ge 41:32 [[וְעַל הִשָּׁנוֹת הַחֲלוֹם]], Ex 22:8, Ru 4:7, Le 5:22, Le 5:26, Da 9:14 b, Ne 9:33; [[חָטָא עַל]] Le 4:14 (‖[[בָּהּ]] v:Le 4:23, cogn. acc. v:Le 4:28), Le 5:5, Nu 6:11, Ne 13:26; …[[עַל־דְּבַר ]] in the matter of, Nu 25:18, Nu 31:16.

It expresses excess (synon. [[מִן]] q.v.); Ge 48:22 I give thee [[שְׁכֶם אַחַר עַל אַחֶיְ]] one shoulder (ridge) above thy brethren, Ex 16:5 [[מִשְׁנֶה על]] double above or beyond, Nu 3:46, De 25:3 stripes [[עַל־אֵלֶּה]] beyond these, Jos 3:15 Jordan [[מָלֵא עַל]] was full over all its banks (cf. Jos 4:18, Is 8:7 b [[הלך על]], [[עלה]]) Ps 138:2, Ec 1:16, Da 1:20 [[עֶשֶׂר יׇדוֹת עַל]] ten times above (cf. in Aram. Da 3:19, and 9alay Qor 37:153), Ezr 1:6 † [[לְבַר עַל]] = beside (v. [[בַּר]]); Ps 16:2 (si vera l.) [[טוֹבָתִי בַל עָלֶיְ]] my welfare is not beyond thee, i.e. does not lie outside thee.—Of time, Le 15:25 if she has an issue [[עַל נִדָּתָהּ]] beyond her time of impurity (cf. Is 32:10,

It denotes elevation or pre-eminence, as [[עליון על]] high (fig.) above, De 26:19 al., De 28:43 [[יעלה עליך]] will go up above thee, cf. Pr 31:29; Ps 57:6, Ps 57:11 be thou exalted above the heavens, Ps 89:8, Ps 95:3, Ps 96:4, etc., Ne 9:5; with words (q.v.) such as [[נכר]], [[גדל]], [[חזק]], [[נשׂא]] (Ni. Pi. Hithp.), [[עזז]], and esp. those denoting rule or superintendence, as [[מלך]], [[הפקיד]]; so with [[שָׁת]], [[היה]], [[נתן]], Ge 41:33, Ge 41:40, Ge 41:43 [[שׂם]]; 1Sa 18:5; with [[פָּקִיר]], [[שַׂר]], [[מֶלֶךְ]], etc., Ge 41:34, Ex 1:11, Ex 18:21, etc.; abs. 2Sa 8:16 Joab was [[על־החבא]] over the host, 2Sa 20:23 b, 2Sa 20:24, 1Ki 4:4–1Ki 4:6, 1Ki 5:6; Nu 10:14 ff. 1Ch 9:23, 1Ch 9:26 ff. 1Ch 27:25 ff. 2Ch 30:17, 2Ch 31:12; [[אֲשֶׁר עַל בֵּיתוֹ]] of Joseph's steward Ge 43:16, Ge 43:19, Ge 44:1, Ge 44:4; and in the official titles [[אֲשֶׁר עַל־הַבַּיִת]] = the Governor of the Palace Is 22:15 al. (v. [[כַּיִת]]
); [[אֲשֶׁר עַל־הַמַּם]] the overseer of the forced labour 1Ki 12:18; [[אשׁר]] [[על־העיר]] the governor of the city 2Ki 10:5, [[אשׁר על המלתחה]] v:2Ki 10:22.
It expresses addition (cf. e)pi\ in Gk., e.g. e)pi\ tou/toiv) ; viz.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: introducing the complement of a verb, as with [[יׇסַף]] to add upon or to, Ps 61:7 + oft. (v. [[יׇסַף]]), [[שָׁת]] to put to Ge 30:40, [[נִלְוׇה]] to be joined to Nu 18:24, Is 14:1 (also c. [[אֶל]]), [[נׇפַל]]: to fall to, i.e. desert to, Je 21:9 +, [[עכר]] to pass over to Ex 30:13; Ex 30:14, Is 45:14 (cf. Is 60:5); also Hb Hab 2:16 [[תִּסּׂב כּוֹם עַל]] La 4:21, Es 4:7; [[נֶחְשַׁב]] to be reckoned to Le 25:31, 2Sa 4:2, [[היה על]] Nu 36:12; Ps 69:28 [[תְּנׇה עָוֹן עַל עֲוֹנׇם]], Is 56:8 [[עוֹר אֲקַבֵּץ עָלָיו]] I will yet gather (others) unto him.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Used absol., as Ge 28:9 he took Maḥalath [[עַל נׇשָׁיו]] in addition to his (other) wives, Ge 31:50 (cf. [[אל]] Le 18:18), Nu 31:8 [[עַל חַלְלֵיהֶם]] in addition to their slain (‖ Jos 13:22 [[אֶל]]), De 23:14, Ez Eze 16:37, Eze 16:43, Eze 25:10; Is 32:10 [[יׇמִים עַל שָׁנׇה]] days upon, in addition to, a year, 2Ch 31:15 [[יׇמִים עַל יׇמִים]], Ez Eze 7:26 [[הׂוׇה עַל]] [[הׂוׇה תָבוֹא]] (‖[[אל]]), Je 4:20 (if [[נִקְרָא]] = be proclaimed), Job 16:14 [[יִפְרְחֵנִי פֶרֶץ עַל־פְּנֵי־פָָרֶץ]] (cf. Lag:M iii. 112; also II. 14:130 e(/lkov e)f) e{lkei, Odyss. 7:120 f; Qor 31:13). So often in laws of P (cf.

definitions.title: c
definitions.body: ), Le 7:12 he shall offer [[עַל־זֶבַת הַתּוֹרָה]] in addition to the sacrifice of thanksgiving, etc., v:Le 7:13 b, Nu 6:20, Nu 15:9, Nu 28:10, Nu 28:15, Nu 28:24 (cf. [[מִלְּבַר]] v:Nu 28:31, Nu 29:6), Nu 35:6; Ez Eze 16:43 (Hi Sm RV: cf. 44:7 [[אל]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: Hence by an easy transition it denotes together with, with, Ex 35:22 men together with([[עַל]]) women, Job 38:32 [[וְעַיִשׁ עַל־בָּנֶיהָ תַנְחֵם]] and the Bear with her children, wilt thou lead them ? 1Ki 15:20, Je 3:18 the house of Isr. with the house of Judah, Mic 5:2 (Ca Ke Kue; but al. as

definitions.title: 7 c
definitions.body: a), Ge 32:12 lest he come and smite me, [[אֵם עַל בָּנִים]] the mother with the children (cf. Ho 10:14, De 22:6); and as a techn. term in the regulations for sacrifice, esp. with [[אכל]], Ex 12:8, [[יאׁכְלֻהוּ]] [[עַל־מְדׂרִים]] together with bitter herbs they shall eat it, v:Ex 12:9 his head with ([[על]]) his legs, etc., Nu 9:11, De 16:3 [[לאׁ־תאׁכַל עָלָיו חָמֵץ]] (cf. Ex 23:18, Ex 34:25), v:De 16:3; in the phrase [[אכל על הדם]] to eat with the blood 1Sa 14:32, 1Sa 14:33 (v:1Sa 14:34 [[אל]]), Le 19:26, Ez Eze 33:25 (cf. in Gk. e.g. e)pi\ tw|= si/tw| pi/nein u(/dwr); see also Le 2:2, Le 2:16, Le 3:4 (so v:Le 3:10, v:Le 3:15, Le 4:9, Le 7:4), Le 4:11, Le 7:13 a, Le 7:30, Le 10:15, Le 14:31, Le 23:18, Le 23:20, Nu 6:17, Nu 19:5; 1Ch 7:4.

It expresses the idea of being suspended, or extended, over anything, without however being in contact with it, above, over: Ge 1:20 let fowl fly over the earth, Ge 19:23 [[השׁמשׁ יחא על]] had come forth upon the earth (cf. [[זרח על]] Ex 22:2 +; [[בא על]] go down [set] upon De 24:15, Mic 3:6; Job 25:3), Nu 10:34, Nu 14:14 and thy cloud stood [[עליהם]] over them, De 28:23 the heavens [[על־ראשׁך]] above overthy head, Is 4:5, Is 60:1, Is 60:2, Zep 2:11, Zec 9:14, Ps 7:8 over it return thou on high, Job 29:3 [[בְּהִלּוֹ נֵרוֹ עֲלֵי ראׁשִׁי]] (cf. [[דעך לְ]] be extinguished over, Job 18:6), Ct So 2:4 his banner over me: fig. of protection De 32:38, Ps 68:35: with vbs. of motion (expressed or implied), [[נשׁקף על]] to incline over 1Sa 13:18 +, [[ידו על נטה]]) Ex 14:16 Is 23:11 + (cf. Ps 21:12), [[הניף על]] to swing over Is 11:15, Is 19:16; [[השׁמיע על]] to proclaim over Je 4:16, Am 3:9, cf. Nu 10:10, 2Ch 13:12, [[שׁם על נקרא]] a name to be called over 2Sa 12:28 + (v. [[קרא]]).
From the sense of inclining or impending over, [[על]] comes to denote contiguity or proximity, Engl. by (or sts. on):—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in designating localities, esp. those beside water, Ge 14:16 [[עַל־הַמִּדְבָּר]] by the wilderness, Ge 16:7 [[עַל עֵין]] [[הַמַּיִם]] by the spring of water, Ge 24:13, Ge 24:30, Ge 29:2 three flocks lying [[עָלֶתהָ]] by it (the well), Ge 41:1, Nu 3:26, Nu 13:29 [[על־הים]] by the sea, Nu 22:5, Nu 24:6 gardens [[עֲלֵי נׇהָר]]. De 3:12, De 33:8, Ju Jdg 5:19, 1Sa 1:9 ´[[על מזוזת היכל י]] (Ez Eze 46:2), 1Sa 4:1, 2Ki 2:7 and they stood [[על־הירדן]] by the Jordan, 2Ki 25:4, Is 19:7, Is 38:20, Ps 1:3 planted by water-courses, Je 17:2, Je 17:8, Job 30:4, Job 31:9 [[על פתח]] by the entrance, Pr 14:19, + oft.; [[על הדרך]] by the way Ge 38:21, 1Sa 24:4; Ez Eze 48:24 ff. [[על גבולו]] adjoining his border; [[עבר על]] to pass by a place 1Ki 9:18, Je 18:16 +, fig. [[עבר על פשׁע]] to pass by transgression, i.e. to overlook it, Mic 7:18 al.: …[[על יְמִין]] on the right of ... Ps 110:5 +, …[[עַליַד ]], …[[עַל יֶרֶךְ ]], …[[עַל כֶּתֶף ]] on the side of ... (see these words): less freq. (exc. as

definitions.title: c
definitions.body: ) with ref. to persons, Nu 2:5 [[וְהַחׂנִים עָלָיו]] and those encamping next him, v:Nu 2:12, v:Nu 2:20, v:Nu 2:27, Nu 6:9 [[וכי ימות מת עליו]], 2Ki 11:11 by the king round about (cf. Nu 3:26 supr.), ´[[עבר על פ]] Ge 18:5, 2Ki 4:9 +.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: 2Sa 9:7, 2Sa 9:10 to eat bread ´[[עַל שֻׁלְחַן פּ]] at any one's table, Ex 16:3 when we sat [[עַל־סִיר]] [[הַבָּשָׂר]], 1Sa 20:24 Kt to sit [[עַל־הַלֶּחֶם]] at meat; 1Sa 25:13, 1Sa 30:24 to remain [[עַל־הַכֵּלִים]]; Pr 23:30 to tarry long [[על־היין]] at (or over) the wine, Job 39:9 :[[עַל־אֲבוּסֶֽ ְ]] at thy crib: cf. [[הַיּוֹשֵׁב עַל הַמִּשְׁפָּט]] Is 28:6.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: Idiomatically, with [[עָמַד]] and [[נִצַּב]] to stand by (lit. over,—orig. no doubt with ref. to one supposed to be seated), Ge 18:2 three men [[נִצָּבִים עָלָיו]] standing by him, v:Ge 18:8 and he [[עׂמֵד עליו]] standing by him under the tree, Ge 24:30 by the camels, Ge 28:13, 1Sa 4:20, 2Sa 1:9, 2Sa 12:17, 2Sa 20:11, 2Sa 20:12, Am 7:7; esp. of persons standing about a superior, as servants or courtiers, Ge 45:l, Ju Jdg 3:19, 1Sa 22:6, 1Sa 22:7, 1Sa 22:17, of persons surrounding a judge Ex 18:13, Ex 18:14, of ´[[י]]'s heavenly ministers, 1Ki 22:19 (cf. Is 6:2 [[ממעל לו]]), Zec 4:16, and with [[התיחב]] Zec 6:5, Job 1:6, Job 2:1; also of one standing by (prop. leaning over) an altar or sacrifice Nu 23:3, Nu 23:6, 1Ki 13:1 (cf.

definitions.title: 7 b
definitions.body: ) Am 9:1; of an Ashêrah by an altar Ju Jdg 6:25, Jdg 6:28 (cf. [[אֵחֶל]] De 16:21).
In connexion with verbs of motion (actual or fig.):—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of motion from a higher place downwards, down upon: thus (a) [[המטיר]] [[על]] to rain upon Ge 2:5, Ge 19:24, [[ירד על]] Ge 15:11, [[יחק על]] to pour upon Ge 28:18, ´[[נפל על חוארי פ]] Ge 33:4, [[נפל על פניו]] to fall on his (own) face Ge 17:3, Ge 17:17, [[שׂם]] [[על]] to put upon, Ge 21:14, Ge 22:6, Ge 22:9, Ge 24:47 (v:Ge 24:22 Sam Di), [[נתן על כף]] to place on the hand of ... Ge 40:11, Ge 40:21, [[השׁליך על]] 2Sa 20:12, etc.; cf. Job 29:22 [[וְעָלֵימוֹ תִּטּׂף]] [[מִלָּתִי]], Mic 3:5, Na 3:12.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: (b) In diff. fig. connexions, as of sleep falling upon one, Ge 2:21, Ge 15:12; of fear Ge 9:2, 1Sa 11:7 (v. [[פַּחַד]], [[חֲרָרָה]], [[אֵימָה]]); of good or bad fortune, esp. the latter, coming upon one, as with [[בוא]] and [[הביא]], Ge 27:12, De 28:2 (in good sense), v:De 28:15, Je 5:12, Je 19:3 ([[רעה]], as oft.); of retribution, reproach, the Divine wrath, etc., with diff. verbs ([[הביא]], [[נתן]], [[ירד]], [[חול]], [[היה]], etc.), as Ge 20:9, Nu 12:11 [[חטאה]]; Ge 42:36 [[עַלַי הָיוּ כֻלָּנׇה]] upon me are they all; Nu 18:5 + ([[היה קֶחֶף על]]); De 19:10 [[דם]] (cf. [[אל]] 2Sa 21:2 LXX We Dr), Ju Jdg 9:24, 1Ki 2:32, 2Sa 16:8, Ho 12:15; 2Sa 3:29; 2Sa 15:14; 1Sa 11:2 [[חרפה]]; Je 14:16; Je 26:15 [[דם נקי]] (‖[[אל]]), Jon 1:14; Ez Eze 7:3, Eze 7:4, Eze 7:8, Eze 23:40, Eze 36:29; Ps 7:17, Ps 94:2, Ps 94:23, Ps 109:5 [[וישׂימו עלי רעה תחת טובה]] (lay  upon me: but Hu [[וישיבו]], Pr 17:13), Ps 140:10; [[שָׁפַךְ חֵמָה על]] Ez Eze 7:8 + oft.; without a verb, Ge 16:5 [[חֲמָסִי עָלֶיְ]] my wrong be upon thee, Je 51:35 (‖[[אל]]); Ge 27:13 [[עלי קללתך]]; Ge 38:29 (accents, RV:m); 2Sa 1:16 [[דמיך]] [[על ראשׁך]]; 2Sa 14:9 [[עָלַי הֶעָוֹן]]; Is 24:17, Je 48:43; Je 50:27; Ez Eze 13:3 …[[הוֹי על ]]; Ps 55:16 Kt.; of a blessing, Ex 32:29, Ps 3:9, a curse De 30:7, mercies (prob. conceived spec. as descending from heaven) Ps 33:22, Ps 86:13, Ps 90:17, Ps 103:17 (with [[נבד]] be mighty over or upon, v:Ps 103:11, Ps 117:2), Ps 116:12, Ps 145:9, Ezr 3:11, [[שׁלום]] Ps 125:6, Ps 128:6, 1Ch 22:9.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: (c) Introducing the object upon which an action, or emotion, esp. if accompanied by a gesture, is conceived as being directed (but with some of these words, esp. when they refer to an event, rather than a person, as Ex 18:9, [[על]] is to be explained from

definitions.title: 1 f
definitions.body: b). Thus with verbs denoting the manifestation of joy or grief, as [[שׂושׂ]] to rejoice over, [[גיל]], [[שׂמח]], [[התענג]], [[התפאר]], [[שׂחק]], [[אבל]], [[ספד]], [[שׁמם]], [[בכה]] Ju Jdg 11:37 +, [[נשׂא]] ([[משׁל]]) [[קינה]] to take up a lament, or proverb, over (see these words); prob. also in [[הִנׇּבֵא על]] prophecy over Ez Eze 11:4, Eze 13:17 +; with [[חוּס]], [[חָמַל]], [[רִחַם]] to shew compassion on (cf. 1Ki 3:26 [Ge 43:30 [[אל]]], Ct So 5:4 [Je 31:20 [[ל]]]); with [[שׁמר]], [[שׁקד]], [[הֵעִיר]] (Job 8:6) to guard or watch over; with [[יעץ]] to counsel upon Is 14:26 +, [[חשׁב]] to devise (usu. in bad sense, Je 29:11 in good), [[דִּבֶּר]] ([[רעה]] Je 11:17 +, [[טובה]] Je 18:20, Je 32:42), [[הֵקִים דָּבָר]] Je 29:10. Of more distinctly phys. acts, with [[בכה]] to weep on Ge 45:14, Ge 45:15 +, [[שׁרק]] to hiss, [[ספק]] or [[תקע כף]] to clap the hand, [[הִכָּה כף]] Ez Eze 22:13 (‖[[אל]]); Is 5:30 to growl over, Is 31:4, Ez Eze 36:2, Job 30:5; [[הִתְוַדָּה]] to confess over (the goat), Le 16:21; Ex 30:10 a (prob.); De 21:6; Job 6:27, Job 41:6.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: From a lower place upwards, up upon, up to, as [[עלה על]] to go up upon: Ex 20:26, 1Sa 2:28, 1Ki 12:33 b, 2Ki 16:12 b, 2Ch 1:6 (an altar, i.e. to a ledge beside it; cf. 2Ki 23:9, and [[ירד]] Le 9:22, 1Ki 1:53); Ju Jdg 9:51, Is 14:14, Is 40:9, etc.; to come up upon (in diff. connexions) Ex 10:12, Le 16:9 (fig.), Le 19:19, 1Sa 1:11, 1Sa 6:7, 1Ki 10:16, 1Ki 10:17; fig. [[עלה על לב]] Is 65:17 + (v. [[לב]], [[לבב]],

definitions.title: 3 d
definitions.body: ); in Hiph. 1Ki 20:33 [[וַיַּעֲלֵהוּ עַל]] [[הַמֶּרְכָּבָה]], Am 8:10 (cf.

definitions.title: 1 a
definitions.body: a), 2Sa 1:24, Ez Eze 37:6, Ps 137:6 (fig.), 2Ch 3:5, 2Ch 3:14 (= ornamented with); De 28:61 (cf. Ex 15:26 b); 2Ch 20:34 the history of Jehu which [[הׂעֲלָח עַל]] was brought up upon (i.e. inserted in) the book of, etc. (cf. 2Ch 32:32; and [[כתב]] [[על]] supr.
); cf. [[נטה יד על־השׁמים]] up to heaven Ex 9:22, Ex 10:21; Ex 17:16.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: Expressing direction towards (not common, exc. in sense against: v. infr.)—(a) with verbs of motion, properly of a person (or thing) moving to another so as either to stand above, or rest upon, it (cf. Pusey:Min. Pr 333), Ex 34:12 [[הארץ אשׁר אתה בא עליה]] (simil., of a land, or place, Ex 18:23, Nu 11:12, 1Ki 2:26 [[עֲנׇתׂת לֵ ְעַל־שָׂדֶיְ]], Ez Eze 32:9, Je 3:18 b, Je 16:13, Je 22:26, and after [[שׁוּב]] or [[הֵשִׁיב]] Je 16:15, Je 22:27, Je 23:3, Je 24:6 [but [[אֶל]] Je 27:22, Je 30:3 al.], Ez Eze 29:14; Ge 40:13 [[וֶהֱשִׁיבְ ְעל־כַּנְָּ֑]], Ge 41:13; Ge 30:33 [[כִּי תָבאׁ עַל]] [[שְׂכָרִי]] to view my hire; [[בא על נפשׁ מֵת]] to enter in upon or beside a corpse; [[בא על אשׁה]] Ge 19:31, De 25:5 (usu. [[אל]]); Jos 3:16 [[מַיִם יׁרְדִים עַל יׇם]], Ez Eze 47:8, 1Ki 18:12 [[יִשָּֽׂאֲ ְעַל־אֲשֶׁר לאׁ־אֵדָָע]], Ps 19:7; 2Ki 16:12; 2Ch 20:24; Is 53:1 upon whom (coming from above) was ´[[י]]'s arm revealed? Is 62:10 [[העמים הרימו נֵס על]] over towards (but Is 49:22 [[אל]]): but often it is dub. if this force is perceptible; and in gen. [[על]] in such cases seems to be used merely as a syn.—perh. as a slightly more graphic syn.—of [[אֶל]] (cf. p. 41); in the later language, also, it may be due partly to the infl. of Aram., which does not use [[אֶל]]; thus (a) with a personal obj., with assemble or be assembled, Ex 32:1, 2Sa 17:11, 1Ki 8:5, 1Ki 11:24, 2Ki 22:20 (2Ch 34:28 and usu. [[אל]]), 2Ch 13:7, [[עלה]] Ge 38:12, Jos 2:8, 1Sa 14:10 (v:1Sa 14:9, v:1Sa 14:12 [[אל]]), [[עבר]] 1Sa 14:4 (v:1Sa 14:1 [[אל]]), [[בא]] 2Sa 15:4 (v. Dr) 1Ch 12:23 f., [[יחא]] 2Ki 24:12, [[הוליך]] 2Ki 25:20, [[נגע]] Ju Jdg 20:34, Jdg 20:41 (cf. Is 6:7, Je 1:9), [[נס]] Is 10:3, [[הלך]] Is 22:15 ([[על]] …[[אל ]]), [[נשׂא]] Is 30:6, [[שׁלח]] 2Ki 18:27 ([[על]] …[[אל ]] …[[על ]]: ‖ Is 36:12 [[על]] …[[אל ]] …[[אל ]]), Je 26:15, Je 29:31, 1Ch 13:2, 2Ch 28:16, 2Ch 30:1, 2Ch 32:9, 2Ch 32:31, 2Ch 36:15, Ne 6:3, [[נגשׁ]] Ez Eze 9:6, [[שׁב]], [[השׁיב]] Ne 4:6 Mal 3:24 (v. c), sq. ´[[על י]] 2Ch 15:4, 2Ch 30:9, [[התיצּב]] 2Ch 11:13; letters going ´[[על פ]] Ne 2:7, Ne 6:17 a (v:b [[אל]]). (b) of places, Ge 24:49, 2Sa 2:19 + [[על ימין]] to the right; with [[הלך]] 1Sa 2:11, 1Ki 20:43 [[על־ביתו]] (1Ki 21:4 [[אל]]), 2Sa 15:20 [[ואני הולך על אשׁר אני הולך]], Je 1:7, Ez Eze 1:20 (v:Eze 1:12 [[אל]]), [[הוליך]] 1Ki 1:38 (v:1Ki 1:33 [[אל]]), [[נהר]] Mic 4:1 (‖ Is 2:2 [[אל]]), Je 31:12 ([[על]] …[[אל ]]), [[נגשׁ]] Ez Eze 44:13 (‖[[אל]]), [[עלה]] 1Sa 24:23, 2Sa 19:1, 1Ki 6:8 (‖[[אל]]), Ez Eze 41:7, [[בא]] Je 14:3, Je 51:51, ([[על הר]]) [[הביא]] Is 66:20 (Is 56:7 [[אל]]), [[ירד]] Je 36:12, [[הִטָּה]] Pr 21:1, [[הסיר]] 2Sa 6:10 (‖ 1Ch 13:13 [[אל]]), [[נתן]] Is 29:12 (v:Is 29:11 [[אל]]) Mic 1:14, Mic 3:5, Ge 42:37, [[השׁיב]], [[שׁב]], Nu 33:7, Je 11:10 (fig., [[עַל עֲוֹנוֹת]]), Ps 35:13, Job 34:15 (Ge 3:19 [[אל]]), Pr 26:11, Ec 1:6, 1Ki 17:21, 1Ki 17:22 (cf. 1Sa 30:12 [[אל]]), [[השׁתחוה]] Le 26:11 (prob.), Is 60:14; pregn. Is 24:22 [[אֻסְּפוּ עַל בּוֹד]] be collected (and delivered) into a dungeon: cf. [[חוּשׁ עַל]] Job 31:5 (fig.), also to requite [[עַל־חֵיק]] Is 65:6, Is 65:7 Kt. (Je 32:18, Ps 79:12 [[אל]]). After [[נראה]] appear, Ps 90:16 ([[על]] …[[אל ]]). And as far as, unto (nearly = [[יַד]]) Ge 49:13 [[וְיַרְכָתוֹעַל חִידוֹן]], Jos 2:7, Jos 18:13, Jos 19:12, Je 31:39, Ez Eze 47:18, Eze 48:21, Eze 48:28, Ps 48:11, 1Ch 5:16.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: (c) Expressing (or implying) the direction of the mind, 2Sa 14:l [[לב המלך על אבשׁלם]]; Mal 3:24, Ezr 6:22; Ct So 7:11 [[וְעָלַי תְּשׁוּקָתוֹ]] (Ge 3:16, Ge 4:7 [[אל]]); [[שָׂם]] [[לִבּוֹ על]] Job 1:8 (Job 2:3 [[אל]]), 1Sa 25:25 ([[על]] …[[אל ]]); Je 22:17 thy eyes and thy heart are only (set) upon ([[על]]) ..., 1Ch 12:17, 1Ki 1:20, 2Ch 20:12 [[עֵינֵינוּ כִּי עָלֶיְ]] (elsewhere [[אל]]), 1Ki 2:15 [[עָלַי שָׂמוּ פניהם]], Ps 146:5 ´[[שִׂבְרוֹ על י]]; Is 10:25 [[וְאַפִּי על־תַּבְלִיתָם]] be (directed) towards their destruction, Je 32:31 (Gf Ew: cf. RV); cf. [[שׁעה על]] look to (trustfully) Is 17:7, Is 31:1. (The uses a, b, c are all exceptional: [[אל]] would be regularly employed.)

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: (d) With the force of over and towards (cf.
and

definitions.title: 7 a
definitions.body: b, end): Ps 65:5 [[נוֹרָא עֲלִילָה עַל]]; to shine, etc. on, Ps 31:17 [[הָאִירָה פָנֶי ְעַל]] (Nu 6:25; [[אל]]); [[רָאָה עַל]] Ex 5:21; [[הוֹפִיעַ עַל]] Job 10:3; [[וְשַׂמְתִּי]] [[עֵינִי עַל]] Am 9:4 + (cf. Job 14:3, Job 24:3, Job 34:21); [[הִשְׁקִיף עַל]] look out over Ps 14:3 +.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: In a hostile sense, upon, against: so very often, after every kind of verb expressing or implying attack, as [[בא]] Ge 34:25, Ge 34:27, [[נֶאֱסַף]] v:Ge 34:30, [[קחף]] to be angry Ge 40:2, [[לון]] to murmur Ex 15:24 [[עמד]] stand up Le 19:16 +, [[קָם]] rise up De 19:11, Am 7:9, [[נלחם]] De 20:10, [[חנה]] 1Sa 11:1, Ps 27:3, [[עלה]] 2Ki 17:3, [[חרה אף]] Zec 10:3 (usu. [[בְּ]]), [[שׁפך סללה]] Is 37:33, [[חוּר]] besiege De 20:12, [[חשׁב]] to devise Ge 50:20, Je 11:19, [[דִּבֶּר]] De 13:6 +, etc.: add Job 16:4, Job 16:4, Job 16:9, Job 16:10, Job 16:13, Job 19:12, Job 21:27, Job 30:12, etc.; [[היה על]] 2Sa 11:23, Nu 31:3: [[הִנְנִי לַיִךְ]] (v.

definitions.title: [[אֶל]] 4
definitions.body: ); note also Ju Jdg 9:31, Jdg 20:5: without a verb Is 9:20; Ju Jdg 16:12 [[פלשׁתים עליך]] the Philistines are upon thee, Jdg 20:9 [[עָלֶיהָ בְּגוֹרָל]] Against it by lot !

By writers of the silver age, [[על]] is sts. used with the force of a dative, 1Ch 13:2 [[אִם]] [[עֲלֵיבֶם טוֹב]] (in classical Heb. [[בְּעֵינֵיכֶם]]) if it seems good to you, [[אִם עַל הַמֶּלֶךְ טוֹב]] † Ne 2:5, Ne 2:7, Es 1:19, Es 3:9, Es 5:4, Es 5:8, Es 7:3, Es 8:5, Es 9:13 (cf. in Aram. Ezr 5:17, Ezr 7:18); [[עַל שָׁפַר]] Ps 16:6 (cf. in Aram. Da 4:24); [[עָרַב עַל]] Ps 104:34 (elsewhere [[לְ]]); [[רַע לְ]] Ec 2:17 (v. De; cf. [[בְּאֵשׁ עַל]] Da 6:15): comp. Job 22:2 [[סָכַן על]] be profitable to, Job 33:23; also [[גׇּמַל עַל]] (in both good and bad sense: v. [[גמל]]), Ne 5:19 [[עשׂה על]], Ne 9:30 [[משׁך על]] prolong (mercy) to; [[הִטָּה חֶסֶד עַל]] Ezr 7:28, Ezr 9:9 (Ge 39:21 [[אל]]): 1Sa 20:8 rd. prob. [[עם]] for [[על]]. Cf. Mish. [[חביב על]], dear to; [[סני על]] hateful to; Syr. 9al rh.iym, 9al mqabal, pleasant, acceptable to.—Comp. in gen. the uses of 9alay, W:AG ii. § 59.

With other particles:—[[עַל אַחֲרֵי]] Ez Eze 41:15; [[עַל בֵּין]] Ez Eze 19:11 (cf. [[אל]] Eze 31:10, Eze 31:14); [[עַל לִפְנֵי]] Ez Eze 40:15; [[עַל מֵעַל]] Ez Eze 41:17 (txt. dub.), v:Eze 41:20; [[עַל עֵבֶר]] Ex 25:37 (cf. [[אל]] Ez Eze 1:9, Eze 1:12); [[עַל־בָּ֫כָה]] Es 9:26 (v. p. 462).—On [[עַל־יַר]], [[עַל־יְדֵי]], [[עַל פִּי]], [[עַל־פְּנֵי]], v. [[יׇד]], [[פֶּה]], [[פָּנִים]].

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[עַל]] alone: (a) because, † Ge 31:20 (E) [[עַל בְּלִי הִגִּיד]], Ps 119:136 [[עַל לאׁ]]. (b) notwithstanding that (above,

definitions.title: 1 f
definitions.body: f), although, † Is 53:9 [[חָמָס עָשָׂה עַל לאׁ]] although he did no violence, Job 16:7 [[עַל לאׁ חָמָס בְּכַפָָּי]].

definitions.title: IV.
definitions.body: Compounds:—
with [[כְּ]] (rare and late),

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: as concerning, as upon † Ps 119:14 [[כְּעַל]] [[כָּל־הוֹן]], 2Ch 32:19.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: (pleon. for [[כְּ]]), † Is 59:18 [[כְּעַל גְּמֻלוֹת כְּעַל יְשַׁלֵּם]] the like of  their deeds is the like of (that which) he will repay ([[כְּעַל]] repeated on the anal. of [[כְּ]] Nu 15:15, Ho 4:9: v. [[כְּ]]) = according to their deeds is (that which) he will repay, Is 63:7 according to.
[[מֵעַל]]:304 from upon, from over, from by—used with much delicacy of application in many different connexions, corresponding mostly with the different senses of [[על]]. Thus

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: from upon idiomatically, when removal, motion, etc., from a surface is involved, as [[מעל האדמה]], [[מעל פני האדמה]] from upon (the face of) the ground, usu. with expel, destroy, perish, etc. Ge 4:14, Ge 6:7, Ge 7:4, Ex 32:l2, De 6:15, De 28:21, De 28:63 + oft,. esp. Je and compiler of K; to be lifted up [[הארץ מעל]] Ge 7:17, Ez Eze 1:19, Eze 1:21 +, to return or be dried (of water) [[מעל הארץ]] Ge 8:3, Ge 8:7, Ge 8:11, Ge 8:13; to roll a stone [[מֵעַל פִּי הַבְּאֵד]] Ge 29:3; of the cloud departing [[האהל מעל]] Nu 9:17, Nu 12:10, cf. Ne 9:19; to rise up [[הַכִּסֵּא מֵעַל]] Ju Jdg 3:20, 1Ki 2:4, [[מֵעַל מִשְׁכָּבוֹ]] 2Sa 11:2; to alight ([[נׇפַל]])[[מֵעַל הַגׇּמָל ]] Ge 24:64 (cf. Jos 15:18 [[חנח]], 1Sa 25:23 [[ירד]]), [[ירד מֵעַל הַמֶּרְכָּבָה]] Ju Jdg 4:15, 2Ki 5:21 ([[נפל]]); to take [[מֵעַל ראׁשׁ]] Ge 40:19, 2Sa 12:30, [[מֵעַל הַמִּזְבֵּחַ]] Le 16:12, Nu 17:11, Is 6:6; to see [[מֵעַל הַגׇּנ]] 2Sa 11:2; to shoot [[מֵעַל הַחוֹמָה]] v:2Sa 11:20, v:2Sa 11:24; to speak [[מֵעַל הַכַּפּׂרֶת]] Ex 25:22, Nu 7:89; to cast down [[מֵעַל יׇדַיִם]] De 9:17, Le 8:28 ([[כַּפַּיִם]]); to break, remove, etc., a yoke ([[חוארך]]) [[מעל שׁכמך]] Ge 27:40, Is 10:27, Je 28:10, Je 28:11; to wipe tears [[מֵעַל כָּל־פָּנִים]] Is 25:8; to take a bandage [[מעל עיניו]] 1Ki 20:41 (cf. [[על]] v:1Ki 20:38); often of putting off a garment or ornament., as Ge 38:14, Ge 38:19 [[וַתָּסַר חְעִיפָהּ מֵעָלֶיהָ]], Ex 33:5 [[הוֹרֵד עֶדְיְ ְמֵעָלֶיְ]], a sandal Ex 3:5, Jos 5:15, a ring [[מֵעַל יׇדוֹ]] Ge 41:42; to seek ([[דרשׁ]]), or hear, words [[מֵעַל הַסֵּפֶר]] Is 34:16, Je 36:11 (cf. [[כתב על ספד]] above); pregn. with [[בָּלָה]] to wear away (and fall) from off, De 8:4, De 29:4, cf. of the bones or skin in disease Job 30:17 [[עֲחָמַי]] [[נִקַּר מֵעָלָָי]] are pierced (and drop) from off me, v:Job 30:30 [[עוֹרִי שָׁחַר מעלי]] is black (and falls) from off me; fig. 1Sa 1:11 [[הָסִירִי יֵינֵח מֵעָלַיִח]] remove thy wine from off thee; Nu 14:9 [[סָר חִלָּם מֵעֲלֵיהֶם]]; Ju Jdg 16:19, Jdg 16:20 [[סר מעליו]] ´[[י]] (with allusion to the hair, as the seat of Samson's strength), 1Sa 16:23 (cf. [[על]] in v:1Sa 16:16).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Of relief from a burden or trouble: as of a plague, stroke, rod, etc., removed from (resting) on one, Ex 10:17 [[וְיׇסֵר מֵעָלַי אֶת־הַמָּוֶת הַזֶּה]], Nu 21:7, Nu 25:8 ´[[וַתֵּעָחַר הַמַּגֵּפָה מֵעַל ישׂר]] 2Sa 24:21, 2Sa 24:25), Ps 39:11 [[הָסֵר מֵעָלַי נִגְעְֶָ]], Job 9:34, Job 13:21, Joe 2:20; of reproach Jos 5:9, Is 25:8, Ps 119:22, iniquity Ez Eze 18:31, Zec 3:4, bloodguiltiness, 1Ki 2:31, wrath Ju Jdg 8:3, Nu 25:11, Pr 24:18, murmurings Nu 17:4; Nu 17:10; [[הֵקֵל מֵעַל]] to lighten from upon one Ex 18:22 +; Am 5:23 [[הָסֵר מֵעָלַיהֲמוֹן שִׁירֶיְ]]; pregn. Jon 1:11, Jon 1:12 that the sea [[יִשְׁתּׂק מֵעָלֵינוּ]] may be calm from off us; to remove, etc., [[מֵעַל פָּנַי]] (v. [[פָּנִים]]); 1Sa 6:20 to whom shall he go up [[מֵעָלֵינוּ]]—not merely ‘from us,’ but—from upon us (relieving us of his presence), so often of an army retiring from a country or raising a siege, 2Sa 10:14 [[ויׇּשָׁב יוֹאָב מֵעַל בְּנֵי עַמּוֹן]], 2Sa 20:21 [[וְאֵעלכָה מֵעַל הָעִיר]], v:2Sa 20:22, 2 K 2Ki 18:14, esp. with [[עָלָה]], [[נַעֲלָה]] 1Ki 15:19, Je 21:2, Je 37:5, Je 37:11 +; 2Sa 19:10 David fled [[מעל אבשׁלום]] from Absalom (whom his presence had encumbered), Ne 13:28 [[וׇאַבְרִיחֵהוּ]] [[מֵעָלַי]], cf. Ge 13:11, Ge 25:6, Nu 20:21 [[מֵעָלָיו]] ´[[וַיֵּט ישׂר]], 2Ch 20:10; Ex 10:28 [[לֵךְ מֵעָלַי]] (contemptuously; be no more obnoxious to me), similarly 2Sa 13:17 [[שׁלחו־נא את־זאת מעלי]] (Amnon of Tamar).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: From beside (cf. [[על]]

definitions.title: 6 c
definitions.body: ), in different nuances: Ge 17:22 God went up [[מעל אברהם]] from beside A., Ge 35:13; Ge 18:3 [[אל נא תעבר מעל עבדך]] (cf. [[על]] v:Ge 18:5), Ge 42:24, Nu 16:25, Nu 16:27; 1Ki 1:53 to come down [[מֵעַל הַמִּזְבֵּחַ]] (cf. [[על]] 1Ki 13:1;

definitions.title: 6 c
definitions.body: and

definitions.title: 7 b
definitions.body: ); from attendance on  Ge 45:1 (cf. [[על]] ib.), Ju Jdg 3:19 [[וְיֵּחְאוּ מֵעָלָיו כָּל־הָעׂמְדִים עָלָיו]] 1Sa 17:15 (v. Dr), 2Sa 13:9, cf.1Sa 13:8, 1Sa 13:11, 2Ki 25:5 (Je 36:21 rd. [[עַל]], [[מ]] being dittogr.), cf. 2Ch 35:15; from attachment to, ´[[רָחַק מֵעַל י]] Je 2:5, Ez Eze 11:15, Eze 44:10, cf. Eze 8:6, ´[[סָר מֵעַל י]] Je 32:40, Ez Eze 6:9, ´[[תָּעָה מֵעַל י]] Ez Eze 44:10, Eze 44:15, cf. Eze 14:5, De 13:11; also [[סָר מֵעַל חַטּאׂות]] 2Ki 10:31, 2Ki 15:18 (usu. [[מֵחטאות]]), cf. Ez Eze 14:6, Eze 23:18; from companionship with, Job 19:13 [[אַחַי מֵעַלַי הִרְחִיק]]; from accompanying protectingly  1Sa 28:15 [[וֵאלֽהִים סָר מֵעַלַי]], v:1Sa 28:16 (cf. [[על]] Ps 110:5; and v. Dr); from adhesion to 2Ki 17:21 [[קָרַע ישׂראל מֵעַל בֵּית תָּוִד]], Is 7:17, Is 56:6 [[יַבְדִּילַנִי]] [[מֵעַל עַמּוֹ]] ´[[י]], Ho 9:1 [[זׇנִיתָ מֵעַל אֱלֽהֶיְ]].

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: In late Heb., = [[עַל]] above: 2Ki 25:28 [[נׇתַן]] ´[[כִּסְאוֹ מֵעַל כִּסֵּא וגו]] (‖ Je 52:32 more class. [[מִמַּעַל לְ]]), Es 3:1, Ps 108:5 [[גדול מעל שׁמים]] (‖ Ps 57:11 [[עַד]]), Ps 148:4, Ec 5:7 [[גׇּבׂהַּ מֵעַל גׇּבׂהַּ שׁׂמֵר]], Ne 3:28, Ne 8:5, 2Ch 34:4 [[לְמַעְלָה]] [[מֵעֲלֵיהֶם]] on high above them; Ez Eze 41:17, Eze 41:20.—Pr 14:14 rd. with De Now Str [[וּמִמַּעֲלָלָיו]].

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: [[מֵעַל לְ]] (chiefly late, and pleon. for [[עַל]], or else = the more class. syn. [[מִמַּעַל לְ]]): (a) Ge 1:7 [[מֵעַל]] [[לָרָקִיעַ]] (Ez Eze 1:26 ´[[מִמַּעַל לְ]]), Ez Eze 1:25 (txt. dub.; v. Comm.), 1Sa 17:39, Jon 4:6, Mal 1:5 upon, over  the border (territory) of Israel (so Köhl Ke: but Hi Ew We beyond, 2Ch 13:4 upon,  mount Zemaraim, 2Ch 24:20. (b) beside 2Ch 26:19 [[מֵעַל לְמִזְבַּח הַקְּטׂרֶת]]; Ne 12:31, Ne 12:31, Ne 12:37, Ne 12:38, Ne 12:38, Ne 12:39 dub.: BeRy (in all) off the side of ([[מִן]]
) = at a little distance from; Ke in v:Ne 12:31, v:Ne 12:38 upon, in v:Ne 12:37, v:Ne 12:38, v:Ne 12:39 by the side of (an ... vorüber).
